授業方法:
For the Spring semester 2021, this course will be held face to face, but may include some ONLINE content in both simultaneous two-way or on-demand format.

< For students permitted to take classes online > - On-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes via Google Classroom. Students need to check LUNA for more details on accessing Google Classroom

This is an all-English classroom environment. Students can expect to communicate with the teacher and other students in English only.
This course is also taught communicatively. So, students can expect to interact with both the teacher and each other through various methods in pursuit of class communicative goals. Methods of interaction that students can expect include, but not limited to, working in pairs, small group discussions, individual and group presentations
